sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Public Land Pack and Saddle Animal Access Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Public Land Pack and Saddle Animal Access Act.

sections.heading: Access to public land. In maintaining public land, the Department of Natural Resources, or other designated agency, shall preserve and facilitate continued use of and access to public land by pack and saddle animals where such use is currently authorized
sections.text: Access to public land. In maintaining public land, the Department of Natural Resources, or other designated agency, shall preserve and facilitate continued use of and access to public land by pack and saddle animals where such use is currently authorized.
